CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 5, 1963, pg. 7, reads: "Del-Glards' Chorus Line - Dressed in slacks, Capri pants and gay-colored pants, these members of the Del-Glards Club of Homestead are part of the chorus line that will be featured at the club's annual Harvest Follies, Oct. 13, at Holiday House. Left to right: Marcella Palmer, Dianne Baker, Scharnelle Tunie, Margaret French, Harriet Collie, Ruby Bassett, Esther Franklin, Marian Thomas, Eunice McWilson and Remah Bailey. Not shown, Rose Hutchings, Delores Foy, Creola Bolden and Vertie Astrop. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of the Del-Glards club, from left: Marcella Palmer, Dianne Baker, Scharnelle Tunie, Margaret French, Harriet Collie, Ruby Bassett, Esther Franklin, Marian Thomas, Eunice McWilson and Remah Bailey wearing capri pants and bermuda shorts, posed in chorus line
